content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs the user, I used the \'browse_website\' command with the URL "https://travel.usnews.com/rankings/worlds-best-vacations/" and asked the question "What are the top 10 travel destinations according to this website?" My computer returned the answer that the top 10 travel destinations are Paris, Bora Bora, Glacier National Park, Rome, Swiss Alps, Maui, London, Maldives, Turks & Caicos, and Tokyo. However, when I used the \'browse_website\' command to access the hyperlink for travel.usnews.com again, my computer advised me not to execute the command again with the same arguments. I received a list of hyperlinks from various sources including travel.usnews.com. I then used the \'get_hyperlinks\' command to access the hyperlink for travel.usnews.com and found that the text does not provide information on things to do in the top 10 travel destinations mentioned in the article. It covers various topics and includes information on U.S. News & World Report\'s editorial guidelines, privacy policy, and terms and conditions. The website also includes links to other sections such as News, Best Countries, and Best States. \n\nMy computer returned a list of hyperlinks from the \'google\' command, which included several rankings from travel.usnews.com. I then used the \'browse_website\' command with the URL "https://www.planetware.com/world/best-places-to-visit-in-the-world-aw.htm" and asked the question "What are some things to do in the top 10 travel destinations according to us news and world report?"'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The text does not provide information on the top 10 travel destinations according to US News and World Report. It does provide travel guides and articles on various destinations around the world, along with maps and photos to inspire ideas for travel. \n \n Links: [' (https://www.planetware.com/)', ' (javascript:;)', 'Europe (https://www.planetware.com/europe-travel.htm)', 'North America (https://www.planetware.com/north-america-travel.htm)', 'Caribbean (https://www.planetware.com/caribbean-travel.htm)']"}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "things to do in the top 10 travel destinations according to us news and world report"}}}'}]
"""
